001package org.biopax.paxtools.impl.level3;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
004import org.biopax.paxtools.model.BioPAXElement;
005import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.ControlledVocabulary;
006import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.UnificationXref;
007import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.Xref;
008import org.biopax.paxtools.util.BPCollections;
009import org.biopax.paxtools.util.ClassFilterSet;
010import org.biopax.paxtools.util.SetEquivalenceChecker;
011import org.slf4j.Logger;
012import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
013
014import java.util.Set;
015
016
017public class ControlledVocabularyImpl extends XReferrableImpl implements
018        ControlledVocabulary
019{
020        private final static Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CellVocabularyImpl.class);
021        
022        private Set<String> term;
023
024        /**
025         * Constructor.
026         */
027        public ControlledVocabularyImpl()
028        {
029                this.term = BPCollections.I.createSet();
030        }
031
032        //
033        // BioPAXElement, Xreferrable implementation
034        //
035        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
036
037        public Class<? extends ControlledVocabulary> getModelInterface()
038        {
039                return ControlledVocabulary.class;
040        }
041
042
043        
044        //
045        // ControlledVocabulary interface implementation
046        //
047        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
048
049        // Property term
050
051        public Set<String> getTerm()
052        {
053                return term;
054        }
055
056        public void setTerm(Set<String> term)
057        {
058                this.term = term;
059        }
060
061        public void addTerm(String term)
062        {
063                if(term != null && term.length()>0)
064                        this.term.add(term);
065        }
066
067        public void removeTerm(String term)
068        {
069                if(term != null)
070                        this.term.remove(term);
071        }
072        
073        @Override
074        protected boolean semanticallyEquivalent(BioPAXElement element) {
075                if(! (element instanceof ControlledVocabulary)) return false;
076                
077                ControlledVocabulary that = (ControlledVocabulary) element;
078                Set<String> terms = BPCollections.I.createSet();
079                terms.addAll(term);
080                terms.retainAll(that.getTerm());
081
082                
083                return getModelInterface().equals(that.getModelInterface()) 
084                                && (term.isEmpty() && that.getTerm().isEmpty() || !terms.isEmpty() )
085                                && SetEquivalenceChecker.hasEquivalentIntersection(
086                                        new ClassFilterSet<Xref, UnificationXref>(getXref(), UnificationXref.class),
087                                        new ClassFilterSet<Xref, UnificationXref>(that.getXref(), UnificationXref.class)
088                                );
089        }
090        
091        @Override
092        public String toString()
093        {
094                String ret = getUri();
095                try {
096                        // in a persistent context, there can be lazy collection initialization exception...
097                        if(!term.isEmpty())
098                                ret = getModelInterface().getSimpleName() +
099                                        "_" + StringUtils.join(term, ",");
100                } catch (Exception e) {         
101                        LOG.warn("toString(): ", e);
102                }
103                return ret;
104        }
105}
